Articles.Content:
Shift + WASD is really tricky to work with when building things like large planes with cargo holds especially. In general it's just hindering my ability to really make the ship what I want it to be.

Not sure if this is already out there, but let me know if it is!

Is it possible to make a 3d manipulator for build mode? So that you can click a key or axis to rotate or move a part on that axis?

There's an example from a 3d modeling program Blender for visual aid.

I see so many cool things built in KSP and I have many ideas myself, but every time I start building I get discouraged.
You know, I've thought about this before, since often the camera and mouse alone aren't suitable for precise positioning. I would approve of such a mod if anyone decided to make it.
GeneCash that's a neat device! Also, I'm ridiculously happy with the latest update ^___^
